title: Doubles & Trebles
message:
Reach exactly zero by finishing on a double.

Long-press any number to choose single, double, or treble.

title: Doubles & Trebles
message:
Reach exactly zero by finishing on a double.

Long-press any number to choose single, double, or treble.

title: Hit or Get Chopped
message:
Hit the target with at least one dart or your score gets halved!

Long-press any number for doubles and trebles.

title: Become a Killer
message:
Hit your own double first to become a Killer, then attack others!

Long-press any number for doubles and trebles.

title: Beat the High Score
message:
Beat the current high score or lose a life.

Long-press any number for doubles and trebles.

title: Avoid Elimination
message:
The lowest score each round is eliminated. Score high to survive!

Long-press any number for doubles and trebles.

title: Score Runs & Take Wickets
message:
Batters score runs on 15-20 and bull. Bowlers take wickets by hitting the bull.

Long-press any number for doubles and trebles.
